  <Code>Public Function BlankZero(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value = 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function

Public Function BlankPos(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value &gt; 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function

Public Function BlankZeroAndPos(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value &gt;= 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function

Public Function BlankNeg(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value &lt; 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function

Public Function BlankNegAndZero(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value &lt;= 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function
</Code>
  <Language>=User!Language</Language>
  <ConsumeContainerWhitespace>true</ConsumeContainerWhitespace>
  <rd:ReportUnitType>Inch</rd:ReportUnitType>
  <rd:ReportID>0eeb6585-38ae-40f1-885b-8d50088d51b4</rd:ReportID>
</Report>
    END_OF_RDLDATA
  }
}

OBJECT Report 50041 Sales Invoice GST Live
{
  OBJECT-PROPERTIES
  {
    Date=30-08-18;
    Time=17:12:25;
    Modified=Yes;
    Version List=;
  }
  PROPERTIES
  {
  }
  DATASET
  {
    { 1000000143;;DataItem;                  ;
               DataItemTable=Table79 }

    { 1000000144;1;Column;Comp_Picture       ;
               SourceExpr="Company Information".Picture }

    { 1000000163;1;Column;IEC_NO             ;
               SourceExpr="Company Information"."IEC No." }

    { 1000000000;1;DataItem;                 ;
               DataItemTable=Table112;
               OnAfterGetRecord=BEGIN
                                  CompInfo.GET();
                                  CompInfo.CALCFIELDS(Picture);
                                  IF CompInfo.FINDSET THEN
                                  IF "Sales Invoice Header"."Currency Code" = '' THEN
                                    CurrCode :='INR'
                                  ELSE
                                  CurrCode:="Sales Invoice Header"."Currency Code";
                                  CLEAR(RoundOff);
                                  RecSalesLine.RESET;
                                  RecSalesLine.SETRANGE("Document No.","Sales Invoice Header"."No.");
                                  RecSalesLine.SETRANGE("No.",'40071');
                                  IF RecSalesLine.FINDSET THEN
                                    RoundOff:=RecSalesLine."Line Amount";

                                  RecCustomer.RESET;
                                  RecCustomer.SETRANGE("No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to Customer No.");
                                  IF RecCustomer.FINDSET THEN BEGIN
                                    //CIN_Bill:=RecCustomer."T.I.N. No.";
                                    CustAddres_Bill:=RecCustomer."Address 3";
                                     GSTIN_Bill:=RecCustomer."GST Registration No.";
                                    AREACode_Bil:=RecCustomer."Area Code";
                                    PAN_Bill:=RecCustomer."P.A.N. No.";
                                    IEC_Bill:=RecCustomer."I.E.C. Code";
                                    Phone_Bill:=RecCustomer."Phone No.";
                                    Website_Bill:= RecCustomer."E-Mail";
                                    StateCodeBill:=RecCustomer."State Code";
                                    END;

                                   RecCustomer.RESET;
                                  //IF "Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Code" <> '' THEN BEGIN
                                   RecCustomer.SETRANGE("No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Code");
                                   IF RecCustomer.FINDSET THEN BEGIN
                                    //CIN_Ship:=RecCustomer."T.I.N. No.";
                                     CustAddres_Ship:=RecCustomer."Address 3";
                                    GSTIN_Ship:=RecCustomer."GST Registration No.";
                                    AREACode_Ship:=RecCustomer."Area Code";
                                    PAN_Ship:=RecCustomer."P.A.N. No.";
                                    IEC_Ship:=RecCustomer."I.E.C. Code";
                                    Phone_Ship:=RecCustomer."Phone No.";
                                    Website_Ship:= RecCustomer."E-Mail";
                                    END
                                    ELSE BEGIN
                                    //CIN_Ship:=CIN_Bill;
                                    CustAddres_Ship:=CustAddres_Bill;
                                    GSTIN_Ship:=GSTIN_Bill;
                                    AREACode_Ship:=AREACode_Bil;
                                    PAN_Ship:=PAN_Bill;
                                    IEC_Ship:=IEC_Bill;
                                    Phone_Ship:=Phone_Bill;
                                    Website_Ship:= Website_Bill;
                                    END;

                                  RecSalesShip.RESET;
                                  RecSalesShip.SETRANGE("Order No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Order No.");
                                  IF RecSalesShip.FINDSET THEN


                                  LocationRec.RESET;
                                  LocationRec.GET("Sales Invoice Header"."Location Code");
                                  StatesRec.RESET;
                                  IF StatesRec.GET(LocationRec."State Code") THEN
                                    StateCmp:=StatesRec.Description;
                                  //GSTIN_Bill:=LocationRec."GST Registration No.";
                                  ContryRec.RESET;
                                  IF ContryRec.GET(LocationRec."Country/Region Code") THEN
                                      ContryCmp:=ContryRec.Name;


                                  GSTEntry.RESET;
                                  RecSalesLine.RESET;
                                  RecSalesLine.SETRANGE("Document No.","Sales Invoice Header"."No.");
                                  IF RecSalesLine.FINDSET THEN BEGIN
                                    GSTEntry.SETRANGE("Document No.",RecSalesLine."Document No.");
                                    //GSTEntry.SETRANGE("No.",RecSalesLine."No.");
                                    //GSTEntry.SETRANGE("Document Line No.",RecSalesLine."Line No.");
                                    IF GSTEntry.FINDSET THEN REPEAT
                                    IF GSTEntry."GST Component Code" = 'CGST' THEN
                                      TotalCGST += (-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                    IF GSTEntry."GST Component Code" = 'SGST' THEN
                                      TotalSGST += (-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                    IF GSTEntry."GST Component Code" ='IGST' THEN
                                      TotalIGST += (-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                  UNTIL GSTEntry.NEXT = 0;
                                  END;
                                  TranspoterRec.RESET;
                                  IF TranspoterRec.GET("Sales Invoice Header"."Shipping Agent Code") THEN;

                                  StatesRec.RESET;
                                  RecCustomer.RESET;
                                  // IF "Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Code" <> '' THEN
                                  // RecCustomer.SETRANGE("No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Code")
                                  // ELSE
                                  RecCustomer.SETRANGE("No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to Customer No.");
                                  IF RecCustomer.FINDSET THEN BEGIN
                                    IF StatesRec.GET(RecCustomer."State Code") THEN BEGIN
                                      StateCode := StatesRec."State Code (GST Reg. No.)";
                                      StateCust := StatesRec.Description;
                                      END;
                                    END;
                                  CLEAR(StateShip);
                                  StatesRec.RESET;
                                  RecCustomer.RESET;
                                  IF "Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Code" <> '' THEN BEGIN
                                  RecCustomer.SETRANGE("No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Code");
                                  IF RecCustomer.FINDSET THEN BEGIN
                                    IF StatesRec.GET(RecCustomer."State Code") THEN BEGIN
                                      //StateCode := StatesRec."State Code (GST Reg. No.)";
                                      StateShip := StatesRec.Description;
                                      END;
                                    END;
                                  END
                                  ELSE BEGIN
                                  StateShip := StateCust;
                                  END;

                                  ContryRec.RESET;
                                  IF ContryRec.GET("Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to Country/Region Code") THEN
                                      ContryCust:=ContryRec.Name;

                                  GSTEntry.RESET;
                                  GSTEntry.SETRANGE(GSTEntry."Document No.","Sales Invoice Header"."No.");
                                  IF GSTEntry.FINDSET THEN
                                    REPEAT
                                    GSTAmt+=(-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                      UNTIL GSTEntry.NEXT = 0;

                                   RecSalesLine.RESET;
                                   RecSalesLine.SETRANGE("Document No.","Sales Invoice Header"."No.");
                                   IF RecSalesLine.FINDSET THEN
                                    REPEAT
                                      TotalLineAmt+=RecSalesLine."Amount To Customer";
                                      UNTIL RecSalesLine.NEXT=0;

                                  TotalAmt := TotalLineAmt ;
                                  CLEAR(AmtInWords);
                                  CLEAR(ChkReport);
                                  ChkReport.InitTextVariable;
                                  ChkReport.FormatNoText(AmtInWords,TotalAmt,'');

                                  CLEAR(SGSTAmtTxt);
                                  CLEAR(ChkReport);
                                  ChkReport.InitTextVariable;
                                  ChkReport.FormatNoText(SGSTAmtTxt,TotalSGST,'');

                                  CLEAR(IGSTAmtTxt);
                                  CLEAR(ChkReport);
                                  ChkReport.InitTextVariable;
                                  ChkReport.FormatNoText(IGSTAmtTxt,TotalIGST,'');


                                  CLEAR(CGSTAmtTxt);
                                  CLEAR(ChkReport);
                                  ChkReport.InitTextVariable;
                                  ChkReport.FormatNoText(CGSTAmtTxt,TotalCGST,'');

                                  // RecSalesShip.RESET;
                                  // RecSalesShip.SETRANGE("Order No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Order No.");
                                END;

               ReqFilterFields=No. }

    { 1000000002;2;Column;InvHeader_No       ;

               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Order Date" }

    { 1000000001;2;DataItem;                 ;
               DataItemTable=Table113;
               DataItemTableView=WHERE(Quantity=FILTER(<>0), No.=FILTER(<>40071));
               OnAfterGetRecord=BEGIN
                                  CLEAR(SGSTRate);
                                  CLEAR(SGSTAmt);
                                  CLEAR(CGSTRate);
                                  CLEAR(CGSTAmt);
                                  CLEAR(IGSTRate);
                                  CLEAR(IGSTAmt);
                                  CLEAR(UnitPrice);
                                  UnitPrice:="Sales Invoice Line"."Unit Price";
                                  GSTEntry.RESET;
                                  GSTEntry.SETRANGE("Document No.","Sales Invoice Line"."Document No.");
                                  GSTEntry.SETRANGE("No.","Sales Invoice Line"."No.");
                                  GSTEntry.SETRANGE(GSTEntry."Document Line No.","Sales Invoice Line"."Line No.");
                                  IF  GSTEntry.FINDSET  THEN REPEAT
                                    IF  GSTEntry."GST Component Code" = 'CGST'  THEN  BEGIN
                                      CGSTRate  :=  GSTEntry."GST %";
                                      CGSTAmt   +=  (-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                      TotCGSTAmt+=CGSTAmt;
                                    END;
                                    IF  GSTEntry."GST Component Code" = 'SGST'  THEN  BEGIN
                                      SGSTRate  :=  GSTEntry."GST %";
                                      SGSTAmt   +=  (-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                      TotSGSTAmt+=SGSTAmt;
                                    END;
                                    IF  GSTEntry."GST Component Code" = 'IGST'  THEN  BEGIN
                                      IGSTRate  :=  GSTEntry."GST %";
                                      IGSTAmt   +=  (-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                      TotIGSTAmt += IGSTAmt;
                                    END;
                                  UNTIL GSTEntry.NEXT = 0;
                                  //END;

                                  RecSalesInv.RESET;
                                  RecSalesInv.SETRANGE("Document No.","Sales Invoice Line"."Document No.");
                                  IF RecSalesInv.FINDSET THEN

                                  CLEAR(NetAmt);
                                  NetAmt := "Sales Invoice Line".Quantity * "Sales Invoice Line"."Unit Price";
                                END;

               DataItemLink=Document No.=FIELD(No.) }

    { 1000000024;3;Column;InvLine_No         ;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Line"."No." }

    { 1000000025;3;Column;InvLine_HSNCode    ;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Line"."HSN/SAC Code" }

    { 1000000026;3;Column;InvLine_Desc1      ;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Line".Description }

  <Code>Public Function BlankZero(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value = 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function

Public Function BlankPos(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value &gt; 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function

Public Function BlankZeroAndPos(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value &gt;= 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function

Public Function BlankNeg(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value &lt; 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function

Public Function BlankNegAndZero(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value &lt;= 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function
</Code>
  <Language>=User!Language</Language>
  <ConsumeContainerWhitespace>true</ConsumeContainerWhitespace>
  <rd:ReportUnitType>Cm</rd:ReportUnitType>
  <rd:ReportID>0eeb6585-38ae-40f1-885b-8d50088d51b4</rd:ReportID>
</Report>
    END_OF_RDLDATA
  }
}

OBJECT Report 50071 Sales Invoice GST FInal
{
  OBJECT-PROPERTIES
  {
    Date=31-08-18;
    Time=13:32:48;
    Modified=Yes;
    Version List=;
  }
  PROPERTIES
  {
  }
  DATASET
  {
    { 1000000143;;DataItem;                  ;
               DataItemTable=Table79 }

    { 1000000144;1;Column;Comp_Picture       ;
               SourceExpr="Company Information".Picture }

    { 1000000163;1;Column;IEC_NO             ;
               SourceExpr="Company Information"."IEC No." }

    { 1000000000;1;DataItem;                 ;
               DataItemTable=Table112;
               OnAfterGetRecord=BEGIN
                                  CompInfo.GET();
                                  CompInfo.CALCFIELDS(Picture);
                                  IF CompInfo.FINDSET THEN
                                  IF "Sales Invoice Header"."Currency Code" = '' THEN
                                    CurrCode :='INR'
                                  ELSE
                                  CurrCode:="Sales Invoice Header"."Currency Code";
                                  CLEAR(RoundOff);
                                  RecSalesLine.RESET;
                                  RecSalesLine.SETRANGE("Document No.","Sales Invoice Header"."No.");
                                  RecSalesLine.SETRANGE("No.",'40071');
                                  IF RecSalesLine.FINDSET THEN
                                    RoundOff:=RecSalesLine."Line Amount";
                                  //CIT193 STARTS
                                  {
                                  RecLocation.RESET;
                                  RecLocation.SETRANGE(Code,"Sales Invoice Header"."Location Code");
                                  IF RecLocation.FINDFIRST THEN
                                    GSTIN_Bill:=RecLocation."GST Registration No."
                                  ELSE BEGIN}
                                    RecCustomer.RESET;
                                    RecCustomer.SETRANGE("No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to Customer No.");
                                    IF RecCustomer.FINDFIRST THEN
                                       GSTIN_Bill:=RecCustomer."GST Registration No.";

                                   // END;
                                  //CIT193 ENDS
                                  RecCustomer.RESET;
                                  RecCustomer.SETRANGE("No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to Customer No.");
                                  IF RecCustomer.FINDSET THEN BEGIN
                                    //CIN_Bill:=RecCustomer."T.I.N. No.";
                                    CustAddres_Bill:=RecCustomer."Address 3";
                                    GSTIN_Bill:=RecCustomer."GST Registration No.";
                                    AREACode_Bil:=RecCustomer."Area Code";
                                    PAN_Bill:=RecCustomer."P.A.N. No.";
                                    IEC_Bill:=RecCustomer."I.E.C. Code";
                                    Phone_Bill:=RecCustomer."Phone No.";
                                    Website_Bill:= RecCustomer."E-Mail";
                                    StateCodeBill:=RecCustomer."State Code";
                                    END;

                                   RecCustomer.RESET;
                                  //IF "Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Code" <> '' THEN BEGIN
                                   RecCustomer.SETRANGE("No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Code");
                                   IF RecCustomer.FINDSET THEN BEGIN
                                    //CIN_Ship:=RecCustomer."T.I.N. No.";
                                     CustAddres_Ship:=RecCustomer."Address 3";
                                    GSTIN_Ship:=RecCustomer."GST Registration No.";
                                    AREACode_Ship:=RecCustomer."Area Code";
                                    PAN_Ship:=RecCustomer."P.A.N. No.";
                                    IEC_Ship:=RecCustomer."I.E.C. Code";
                                    Phone_Ship:=RecCustomer."Phone No.";
                                    Website_Ship:= RecCustomer."E-Mail";
                                    END
                                    ELSE BEGIN
                                    //CIN_Ship:=CIN_Bill;
                                    CustAddres_Ship:=CustAddres_Bill;
                                    GSTIN_Ship:=GSTIN_Bill;
                                    AREACode_Ship:=AREACode_Bil;
                                    PAN_Ship:=PAN_Bill;
                                    IEC_Ship:=IEC_Bill;
                                    Phone_Ship:=Phone_Bill;
                                    Website_Ship:= Website_Bill;
                                    END;

                                  RecSalesShip.RESET;
                                  RecSalesShip.SETRANGE("Order No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Order No.");
                                  IF RecSalesShip.FINDSET THEN;


                                  LocationRec.RESET;
                                  LocationRec.GET("Sales Invoice Header"."Location Code");
                                  StatesRec.RESET;
                                  IF StatesRec.GET(LocationRec."State Code") THEN
                                    StateCmp:=StatesRec.Description;

                                  ContryRec.RESET;
                                  IF ContryRec.GET(LocationRec."Country/Region Code") THEN
                                      ContryCmp:=ContryRec.Name;


                                  GSTEntry.RESET;
                                  RecSalesLine.RESET;
                                  RecSalesLine.SETRANGE("Document No.","Sales Invoice Header"."No.");
                                  IF RecSalesLine.FINDSET THEN BEGIN
                                    GSTEntry.SETRANGE("Document No.",RecSalesLine."Document No.");
                                    //GSTEntry.SETRANGE("No.",RecSalesLine."No.");
                                    //GSTEntry.SETRANGE("Document Line No.",RecSalesLine."Line No.");
                                    IF GSTEntry.FINDSET THEN REPEAT
                                    IF GSTEntry."GST Component Code" = 'CGST' THEN
                                      TotalCGST += (-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                    IF GSTEntry."GST Component Code" = 'SGST' THEN
                                      TotalSGST += (-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                    IF GSTEntry."GST Component Code" ='IGST' THEN
                                      TotalIGST += (-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                  UNTIL GSTEntry.NEXT = 0;
                                  END;
                                  TranspoterRec.RESET;
                                  IF TranspoterRec.GET("Sales Invoice Header"."Shipping Agent Code") THEN;

                                  StatesRec.RESET;
                                  RecCustomer.RESET;
                                  // IF "Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Code" <> '' THEN
                                  // RecCustomer.SETRANGE("No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Code")
                                  // ELSE
                                  RecCustomer.SETRANGE("No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to Customer No.");
                                  IF RecCustomer.FINDSET THEN BEGIN
                                    IF StatesRec.GET(RecCustomer."State Code") THEN BEGIN
                                      StateCode := StatesRec."State Code (GST Reg. No.)";
                                      StateCust := StatesRec.Description;
                                      END;
                                    END;
                                  CLEAR(StateShip);
                                  StatesRec.RESET;
                                  RecCustomer.RESET;
                                  IF "Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Code" <> '' THEN BEGIN
                                  RecCustomer.SETRANGE("No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Code");
                                  IF RecCustomer.FINDSET THEN BEGIN
                                    IF StatesRec.GET(RecCustomer."State Code") THEN BEGIN
                                      //StateCode := StatesRec."State Code (GST Reg. No.)";
                                      StateShip := StatesRec.Description;
                                      END;
                                    END;
                                  END
                                  ELSE BEGIN
                                  StateShip := StateCust;
                                  END;

                                  ContryRec.RESET;
                                  IF ContryRec.GET("Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to Country/Region Code") THEN
                                      ContryCust:=ContryRec.Name;

                                  GSTEntry.RESET;
                                  GSTEntry.SETRANGE(GSTEntry."Document No.","Sales Invoice Header"."No.");
                                  IF GSTEntry.FINDSET THEN
                                    REPEAT
                                    GSTAmt+=(-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                      UNTIL GSTEntry.NEXT = 0;

                                   RecSalesLine.RESET;
                                   RecSalesLine.SETRANGE("Document No.","Sales Invoice Header"."No.");
                                   IF RecSalesLine.FINDSET THEN
                                    REPEAT
                                      TotalLineAmt+=RecSalesLine."Amount To Customer";
                                      UNTIL RecSalesLine.NEXT=0;

                                  TotalAmt := TotalLineAmt ;
                                  CLEAR(AmtInWords);
                                  CLEAR(ChkReport);
                                  ChkReport.InitTextVariable;
                                  ChkReport.FormatNoText(AmtInWords,TotalAmt,'');

                                  CLEAR(SGSTAmtTxt);
                                  CLEAR(ChkReport);
                                  ChkReport.InitTextVariable;
                                  ChkReport.FormatNoText(SGSTAmtTxt,TotalSGST,'');

                                  CLEAR(IGSTAmtTxt);
                                  CLEAR(ChkReport);
                                  ChkReport.InitTextVariable;
                                  ChkReport.FormatNoText(IGSTAmtTxt,TotalIGST,'');

                                  CLEAR(NetAmt);

                                  CLEAR(CGSTAmtTxt);
                                  CLEAR(ChkReport);
                                  ChkReport.InitTextVariable;
                                  ChkReport.FormatNoText(CGSTAmtTxt,TotalCGST,'');

                                  // RecSalesShip.RESET;
                                  // RecSalesShip.SETRANGE("Order No.","Sales Invoice Header"."Order No.");
                                END;

               ReqFilterFields=No. }

    { 1000000002;2;Column;InvHeader_No       ;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."No." }

    { 1000000168;2;Column;InvHeader_GRT      ;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Time of Removal" }

    { 1000000003;2;Column;InvHeader_PostingDate;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Posting Date" }

    { 1000000004;2;Column;InvHeader_ShippmentDate;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Shipment Date" }

    { 1000000005;2;Column;InvHeader_BillToName;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to Name" }

    { 1000000006;2;Column;InvHeader_BillToAddress;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to Address" }

    { 1000000007;2;Column;InvHeader_BillToAddress1;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to Address 2" }

    { 1000000008;2;Column;InvHeader_BillToCity;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to City" }

    { 1000000009;2;Column;InvHeader_BillToContact;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to Contact" }

    { 1000000010;2;Column;InvHeader_BillToPostCode;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to Post Code" }

    { 1000000011;2;Column;InvHeader_BIllToCountry;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Bill-to County" }

    { 1000000012;2;Column;InvHeader_ShipToName;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Name" }

    { 1000000013;2;Column;InvHeader_ShipToAddress;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Address" }

    { 1000000014;2;Column;InvHeader_ShipToAddress1;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Address 2" }

    { 1000000015;2;Column;InvHeader_ShipToCity;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to City" }

    { 1000000016;2;Column;InvHeader_ShipToContact;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Ship-to Contact" }

    { 1000000017;2;Column;InvHeader_ShipToPostCode;

               SourceExpr=RoundOff }

    { 1000000162;2;Column;ContryCust         ;
               SourceExpr=ContryCust }

    { 1000000174;2;Column;PoDate             ;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Header"."Order Date" }

    { 1000000001;2;DataItem;                 ;
               DataItemTable=Table113;
               DataItemTableView=WHERE(Quantity=FILTER(<>0), No.=FILTER(<>40071));
               OnPreDataItem=BEGIN
                               lincount := 0;
                               TotalLines  :=  "Sales Invoice Line".COUNT;

                               CLEAR(SiNo);
                             END;

               OnAfterGetRecord=BEGIN
                                  lincount += 1;
                                  SiNo:=SiNo+1;
                                  CLEAR(Descrp);
                                  IF "Sales Invoice Line".Description <> '' THEN
                                    Descrp := "Sales Invoice Line".Description + "Sales Invoice Line"."Description 2"
                                  ELSE
                                    Descrp := '';


                                  CLEAR(SGSTRate);
                                  CLEAR(SGSTAmt);
                                  CLEAR(CGSTRate);
                                  CLEAR(CGSTAmt);
                                  CLEAR(IGSTRate);
                                  CLEAR(IGSTAmt);
                                  CLEAR(UnitPrice);
                                  UnitPrice:="Sales Invoice Line"."Unit Price";
                                  GSTEntry.RESET;
                                  GSTEntry.SETRANGE("Document No.","Sales Invoice Line"."Document No.");
                                  GSTEntry.SETRANGE("No.","Sales Invoice Line"."No.");
                                  GSTEntry.SETRANGE(GSTEntry."Document Line No.","Sales Invoice Line"."Line No.");
                                  IF  GSTEntry.FINDSET  THEN REPEAT
                                    IF  GSTEntry."GST Component Code" = 'CGST'  THEN  BEGIN
                                      CGSTRate  :=  GSTEntry."GST %";
                                      CGSTAmt   +=  (-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                      TotCGSTAmt+=CGSTAmt;
                                    END;
                                    IF  GSTEntry."GST Component Code" = 'SGST'  THEN  BEGIN
                                      SGSTRate  :=  GSTEntry."GST %";
                                      SGSTAmt   +=  (-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                      TotSGSTAmt+=SGSTAmt;
                                    END;
                                    IF  GSTEntry."GST Component Code" = 'IGST'  THEN  BEGIN
                                      IGSTRate  :=  GSTEntry."GST %";
                                      IGSTAmt   +=  (-1*GSTEntry."GST Amount");
                                      TotIGSTAmt += IGSTAmt;
                                    END;
                                  UNTIL GSTEntry.NEXT = 0;
                                  //END;

                                  RecSalesInv.RESET;
                                  RecSalesInv.SETRANGE("Document No.","Sales Invoice Line"."Document No.");
                                  IF RecSalesInv.FINDSET THEN

                                  //CLEAR(NetAmt);
                                  //NetAmt += "Sales Invoice Line".Quantity * "Sales Invoice Line"."Unit Price";

                                  NetAmt += "Sales Invoice Line".Amount;
                                END;

               DataItemLink=Document No.=FIELD(No.) }

    { 1000000176;3;Column;Sino               ;
               SourceExpr=SiNo }

    { 1000000024;3;Column;InvLine_No         ;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Line"."No." }

    { 1000000025;3;Column;InvLine_HSNCode    ;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Line"."HSN/SAC Code" }

    { 1000000026;3;Column;InvLine_Desc1      ;
               SourceExpr=Descrp }

    { 1000000027;3;Column;InvLine_Desc2      ;
               SourceExpr="Sales Invoice Line"."Description 2" }

    VAR
      RecCustomer@1000000000 : Record 18;
      CIN_Bill@1000000001 : Code[20];

      RoundOff@1000000056 : Decimal;
      CustAddres_Bill@1000000057 : Text[30];
      CustAddres_Ship@1000000058 : Text[30];
      RecSalesInv@1000000059 : Record 113;
      FrieghtAmt@1000000060 : Decimal;
      StateShip@1000000061 : Text;

      MaxNoLine@10000066 : Integer;
      i@1000065 : Integer;
      ExtraLine@1000064 : Integer;
      TotalLines@1000063 : Integer;
      HideVal@1000062 : Text;
      SiNo@1000000062 : Integer;
      Descrp@1000000063 : Text;
      RecLocation@1000000064 : Record 14;
      BillCusromer@1000000065 : Record 18;
      ShipCustomer@1000000066 : Record 18;

    PROCEDURE NoOfEmptyLinesToPrint@1000000037(FPMinLine@1000000000 : Integer;FPMaxLine@1000000001 : Integer;NPMinLine@1000000002 : Integer;NPMaxLine@1000000003 : Integer;TotalLines@1000000004 : Integer) : Integer;
    VAR
      MaxLinesToPrint@1000000005 : Integer;
      FirstPage@1000000006 : Boolean;
    BEGIN
      FirstPage :=  TRUE;
      WHILE TotalLines > 0  DO BEGIN
        IF  FirstPage THEN  BEGIN
          IF  TotalLines  <=  FPMinLine THEN  BEGIN
            MaxLinesToPrint  :=  FPMinLine - TotalLines;
            TotalLines  :=  0;
            FirstPage :=  FALSE;
          END
          ELSE  BEGIN
            IF  TotalLines  <=  FPMaxLine  THEN BEGIN
              MaxLinesToPrint  :=  (FPMaxLine - TotalLines) + NPMinLine;
              TotalLines  :=  0;
            END ELSE
              TotalLines  -=  FPMaxLine;
            FirstPage :=  FALSE;
          END;
        END ELSE  BEGIN
          IF  TotalLines  <=  NPMinLine THEN  BEGIN
            MaxLinesToPrint  :=  NPMinLine - TotalLines;
            TotalLines  :=  0;
          END
          ELSE
            IF  TotalLines  <=NPMaxLine THEN  BEGIN
              MaxLinesToPrint  :=  (NPMaxLine - TotalLines) + NPMinLine;
              TotalLines  :=  0;
            END ELSE
              TotalLines  -=  NPMaxLine;
        END;
      END;
      EXIT(MaxLinesToPrint);
    END;

    BEGIN
    END.
  }

  <Code>Public Function BlankZero(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value = 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function

Public Function BlankPos(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value &gt; 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function

Public Function BlankZeroAndPos(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value &gt;= 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function

Public Function BlankNeg(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value &lt; 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function

Public Function BlankNegAndZero(ByVal Value As Decimal)
    if Value &lt;= 0 then
        Return ""
    end if
    Return Value
End Function
</Code>
  <Language>=User!Language</Language>
  <ConsumeContainerWhitespace>true</ConsumeContainerWhitespace>
  <rd:ReportUnitType>Cm</rd:ReportUnitType>
  <rd:ReportID>0eeb6585-38ae-40f1-885b-8d50088d51b4</rd:ReportID>
</Report>
    END_OF_RDLDATA
  }
}

OBJECT Codeunit 400 SMTP Mail
{
  OBJECT-PROPERTIES
  {
    Date=12-10-18;
    Time=18:08:11;
    Modified=Yes;
    Version List=NAVW19.00.00.45778;
  }
  PROPERTIES
  {
    Permissions=TableData 409=r;
    OnRun=BEGIN
          END;

  }
  CODE
  {
    VAR
      SMTPMailSetup@1003 : Record 409;
      Mail@1000 : DotNet "'Microsoft.Dynamics.Nav.SMTP, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35'.Microsoft.Dynamics.Nav.SMTP.SmtpMessage" RUNONCLIENT;
      Text002@1002 : TextConst 'ENU=Attachment %1 does not exist or can not be accessed from the program.;ENN=Attachment %1 does not exist or can not be accessed from the program.';
      Text003@1005 : TextConst 'ENU=The SMTP mail system returned the following error: "%1".;ENN=The SMTP mail system returned the following error: "%1".';
      SendResult@1004 : Text;

    PROCEDURE CreateMessage@1(SenderName@1008 : Text;SenderAddress@1000 : Text;Recipients@1001 : Text;Subject@1004 : Text;Body@1005 : Text;HtmlFormatted@1006 : Boolean);
    BEGIN
      IF Recipients <> '' THEN
        CheckValidEmailAddresses(Recipients);
      CheckValidEmailAddresses(SenderAddress);
      SMTPMailSetup.GET;
      SMTPMailSetup.TESTFIELD("SMTP Server");
      IF NOT ISNULL(Mail) THEN BEGIN
        Mail.Dispose;
        CLEAR(Mail);
      END;
      SendResult := '';
      Mail := Mail.SmtpMessage;
      Mail.FromName := SenderName;
      Mail.FromAddress := SenderAddress;
      Mail."To" := Recipients;
      Mail.Subject := Subject;
      Mail.Body := Body;
      Mail.HtmlFormatted := HtmlFormatted;
    END;

    PROCEDURE TrySend@10() : Boolean;
    BEGIN
      SendResult := '';
      WITH SMTPMailSetup DO
        SendResult :=
          Mail.Send(
            "SMTP Server",
            "SMTP Server Port",
            Authentication <> Authentication::Anonymous,
            "User ID",
            Password,
            "Secure Connection");
      Mail.Dispose;
      CLEAR(Mail);

      EXIT(SendResult = '');
    END;

    PROCEDURE Send@3();
    BEGIN
      IF NOT TrySend THEN
        ERROR(Text003,SendResult);
    END;

    PROCEDURE AddRecipients@4(Recipients@1000 : Text);
    VAR
      Result@1001 : Text;
    BEGIN
      CheckValidEmailAddresses(Recipients);
      Result := Mail.AddRecipients(Recipients);
      IF Result <> '' THEN
        ERROR(Text003,Result);
    END;

    PROCEDURE AddCC@5(Recipients@1000 : Text);
    VAR
      Result@1001 : Text;
    BEGIN
      CheckValidEmailAddresses(Recipients);
      Result := Mail.AddCC(Recipients);
      IF Result <> '' THEN
        ERROR(Text003,Result);
    END;

    PROCEDURE AddBCC@6(Recipients@1000 : Text);
    VAR
      Result@1001 : Text;
    BEGIN
      CheckValidEmailAddresses(Recipients);
      Result := Mail.AddBCC(Recipients);
      IF Result <> '' THEN
        ERROR(Text003,Result);
    END;

    PROCEDURE AppendBody@7(BodyPart@1000 : Text);
    VAR
      Result@1001 : Text;
    BEGIN
      Result := Mail.AppendBody(BodyPart);
      IF Result <> '' THEN
        ERROR(Text003,Result);
    END;

    PROCEDURE AddAttachment@2(Attachment@1000 : Text;FileName@1002 : Text);
    VAR
      FileManagement@1003 : Codeunit 419;
      Result@1001 : Text;
    BEGIN
      IF Attachment = '' THEN
        EXIT;
      IF NOT EXISTS(Attachment) THEN
        ERROR(Text002,Attachment);

      FileName := FileManagement.StripNotsupportChrInFileName(FileName);
      FileName := DELCHR(FileName,'=',';'); // Used for splitting multiple file names in Mail .NET component

      Result := Mail.AddAttachmentWithName(Attachment,FileName);

      IF Result <> '' THEN
        ERROR(Text003,Result);
    END;

    PROCEDURE AddAttachmentStream@15(AttachmentStream@1000 : InStream;AttachmentName@1001 : Text);
    VAR
      FileManagement@1002 : Codeunit 419;
    BEGIN
      AttachmentName := FileManagement.StripNotsupportChrInFileName(AttachmentName);

      Mail.AddAttachment(AttachmentStream,AttachmentName);
    END;

    PROCEDURE CheckValidEmailAddresses@8(Recipients@1000 : Text);
    VAR
      MailManagement@1002 : Codeunit 9520;
    BEGIN
      MailManagement.CheckValidEmailAddresses(Recipients);
    END;

    PROCEDURE GetLastSendMailErrorText@9() : Text;
    BEGIN
      EXIT(SendResult);
    END;

    PROCEDURE GetSMTPMessage@35(VAR SMTPMessage@1000 : DotNet "'Microsoft.Dynamics.Nav.SMTP, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35'.Microsoft.Dynamics.Nav.SMTP.SmtpMessage");
    BEGIN
      SMTPMessage := Mail;
    END;

    PROCEDURE IsEnabled@11() : Boolean;
    BEGIN
      IF SMTPMailSetup.FIND THEN
        EXIT(NOT (SMTPMailSetup."SMTP Server" = ''));

      EXIT(FALSE);
    END;

    PROCEDURE ApplyOffice365Smtp@12(VAR SMTPMailSetupConfig@1000 : Record 409);
    BEGIN
      // This might be changed by the Microsoft Office 365 team.
      // Current source: http://technet.microsoft.com/library/dn554323.aspx
      SMTPMailSetupConfig."SMTP Server" := 'smtp.office365.com';
      SMTPMailSetupConfig."SMTP Server Port" := 587;
      SMTPMailSetupConfig.Authentication := SMTPMailSetupConfig.Authentication::Basic;
      SMTPMailSetupConfig."Secure Connection" := TRUE;
    END;

    [EventSubscriber(Table,1400,OnRegisterServiceConnection)]
    PROCEDURE HandleSMTPRegisterServiceConnection@14(VAR ServiceConnection@1000 : Record 1400);
    VAR
      SMTPMailSetup@1001 : Record 409;
      RecRef@1002 : RecordRef;
    BEGIN
      IF NOT SMTPMailSetup.GET THEN BEGIN
        IF NOT SMTPMailSetup.WRITEPERMISSION THEN
          EXIT;
        SMTPMailSetup.INIT;
        SMTPMailSetup.INSERT;
      END;

      RecRef.GETTABLE(SMTPMailSetup);

      ServiceConnection.Status := ServiceConnection.Status::Enabled;
      IF SMTPMailSetup."SMTP Server" = '' THEN
        ServiceConnection.Status := ServiceConnection.Status::Disabled;

      WITH SMTPMailSetup DO
        ServiceConnection.InsertServiceConnection(
          ServiceConnection,RecRef.RECORDID,TABLECAPTION,'',PAGE::"SMTP Mail Setup");
    END;

    PROCEDURE GetBody@13() : Text;
    BEGIN
      EXIT(Mail.Body);
    END;

    BEGIN
    END.
  }
}

OBJECT Codeunit 70001 SoEmail
{
  OBJECT-PROPERTIES
  {
    Date=14-11-18;
    Time=11:30:51;
    Modified=Yes;
    Version List=;
  }
  PROPERTIES
  {
    OnRun=BEGIN
          END;

  }
  CODE
  {
    VAR
      SmtpMail@1009 : Codeunit 400;
      CustRec@1008 : Record 18;
      SalesRec@1007 : Record 13;
      SalesHeader@1006 : Record 36;
      Str1@1005 : Text[250];
      tex@1004 : Text[80];
      ostream@1003 : OutStream;
      MYFile@1002 : File;
      EmailItemRec@1001 : Record 9500;
      EmailConfirm@1000 : Page 9700;
      FileName@1010 : Text;
      FilePath@1011 : Text;
      Str2@1012 : Text[250];
      emailRec@1013 : Record 70000;
      CompRec@1014 : Record 79;
      CompanyLogo@1018 : Record 99008535;
      FileLogo@1017 : Text;
      FileManagement@1016 : Codeunit 419;
      FileName1@1015 : Text;

    [EventSubscriber(Page,42,OnAfterActionEvent,Action33)]
    PROCEDURE InitAll@4(VAR Rec@1000 : Record 36);
    BEGIN
      CompRec.GET;
      CompRec.CALCFIELDS(Picture);
      CompanyLogo.DELETEALL;
      IF CompRec.Picture.HASVALUE THEN BEGIN
       CompanyLogo.INIT;
       CompanyLogo.Blob := CompRec.Picture;
       CompanyLogo.INSERT;
       FileName1 := 'tmp*.tmp.jpg';
       FileLogo := FileManagement.BLOBExport(CompanyLogo,FileName1,FALSE);
      END;
      FileName := Rec."No." + '.pdf';
      FilePath := 'D:\share16\Renupriya\' + FileName;
      Rec.SETRANGE("No.",Rec."No.");
      REPORT.SAVEASPDF(50001,FilePath,Rec);
      CLEAR(SmtpMail);
      Str2 := STRSUBSTNO('order Confirmation..%1 Date %2',Rec."No.",Rec."Order Date");
      IF CustRec.GET(Rec."Sell-to Customer No.") THEN
      SmtpMail.CreateMessage('Renupriya','renupriya.k@cetastech.com',CustRec."E-Mail",Str2,'',TRUE);
      IF SalesRec.GET(Rec."Salesperson Code") THEN
      //SmtpMail.AddCC(SalesRec."E-Mail" +';' + SalesRec."E-Mail 2");
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<body><h2>Dear Sir/Maam<h2><h3>Greetings from Durian Furniture!<h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>Please find attached the details of your confirmed order no.%1.Dated.%2<h3>',Rec."No.",Rec."Order Date");
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>Congratulations on becoming the member of our growing Durian family. We are happy to have served over 2.8 million happy customers just like you.<h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>Thank you for shopping with us.<h3><h3>If you have any queries please feel free to contact us.<h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>Thanks and Regards.<h3><h3>Sales Manager</h3><h3>DURIAN INDUSTRIES LIMITED</h3><img src = "cronous/png width:500px;height:500px;"><h1><img src ="CompRec.Picture/jpeg width:42px;height:42px;"');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h4>401,THE SUMMIT,HANUMAN ROAD,WESTERN EXPRESS HIGHWAY,VILE PARLE-EAST,MUMBAI-400057,MAHARASHTRA-INDIA</h4><h4>PHONENO.-022-26269000<h4>PAN- AAACD1698N<h4>EMAIL-info@durian.in</h4>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      SmtpMail.AppendBody('<img src ="HEIGHT: 153px; WIDTH: 445px" src="file:///'+ FileLogo +'"' +'width=100 height=100>');
      SmtpMail.AddAttachment(FilePath,FileName);
      SmtpMail.Send;
    END;

    BEGIN
    END.
  }
}

OBJECT Codeunit 70002 SalesInvMail
{
  OBJECT-PROPERTIES
  {
    Date=22-10-18;
    Time=15:36:29;
    Modified=Yes;
    Version List=;
  }
  PROPERTIES
  {
    OnRun=BEGIN
          END;

  }
  CODE
  {
    VAR
      SmtpMail@1009 : Codeunit 400;
      Str1@1008 : Text[250];
      invoiceHeader@1007 : Record 112;
      EmailItemRec@1006 : Record 9500;
      CustRec@1005 : Record 18;
      SalesRec@1004 : Record 13;
      tex@1003 : Text[300];
      MYFile@1002 : File;
      ostream@1001 : OutStream;
      EmailConfirm@1000 : Page 9700;
      Filepath@1010 : Text;
      FileName@1011 : Text;
      emailrec@1012 : Record 70000;
      CompRec@1013 : Record 79;
      CompanyLogo@1017 : Record 99008535;
      FileLogo@1016 : Text;
      FileManagement@1015 : Codeunit 419;
      FileName1@1014 : Text;

    [EventSubscriber(Page,132,OnAfterActionEvent,SendCustom)]
    PROCEDURE InitAll@1(VAR Rec@1000 : Record 112);
    BEGIN
      CompRec.GET;
      CompRec.CALCFIELDS(Picture);
      CLEAR(CompanyLogo);
      CompanyLogo.DELETEALL;
      IF CompRec.Picture.HASVALUE THEN BEGIN
       CompanyLogo.INIT;
       CompanyLogo.Blob := CompRec.Picture;
       CompanyLogo.INSERT;
       FileName1 := 'tmp*.tmp.jpg';
       FileLogo := FileManagement.BLOBExport(CompanyLogo,FileName1,FALSE);
      END;
      FileName := Rec."No." + '.pdf';
      FileName := DELCHR(FileName,'=','-:\/');
      Filepath := 'D:\share16\Renupriya\' + FileName;
      Rec.SETRANGE("No.",Rec."No.");
      REPORT.SAVEASPDF(50002,Filepath,Rec);

      CLEAR(SmtpMail);
      tex := STRSUBSTNO('Sales invoice No. %1 Date %2',Rec."No.",Rec."Order Date");
      IF CustRec.GET(Rec."Sell-to Customer No.") THEN
      SmtpMail.CreateMessage('Renupriya','renupriya.k@cetastech.com',CustRec."E-Mail",tex,'',TRUE);
      IF SalesRec.GET(Rec."Salesperson Code") THEN
      SmtpMail.AddCC(SalesRec."E-Mail" +';'+ SalesRec."E-Mail 2");
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<body><h2>Dear Sir/Maam,<h2><h3>Greetings from Durian Furniture!</h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 :=STRSUBSTNO('<h3>Congratulations on becoming the member of our growing Durian family. We are happy to have served over 2.8 million happy customers just like you.</h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>Kindly find attached the digital copy of the invoice for furniture you purchased from us on %1 against order Id No.%2<h3>',invoiceHeader."Order Date",invoiceHeader."No.");
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>In case of any queries or after sales service needed, we request you to keep this copy handy for future reference while getting in touch with us.</h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>If you are satisfied with your purchase we request you to write in a review for the product you purchased and the service provided by our team. </h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>If you have any queries kindly get in touch with us via <h3><h3>Email: customersupport@durian.in</h3><h3>Call us toll free : 1800 22 3242<h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>Thanks and Regards.<h3><h3>Sales Manager,</h3><h3>DURIAN INDUSTRIES LIMITED</h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>401,THE SUMMIT,HANUMAN ROAD,WESTERN EXPRESS HIGHWAY,VILE PARLE-EAST,MUMBAI-400057,MAHARASHTRA-INDIA</h3><h4>PHONENO.-022-26269000<h4>PAN- AAACD1698N<h4>EMAIL-info@durian.in</h4>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      SmtpMail.AppendBody('<IMG style="HEIGHT: 153px; WIDTH: 445px" src="file:///'+ FileLogo +'"' +'width=100 height=100>');
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3><u>Note : </u></h3><h3>1.System should send email to customer whose email id is default.</h3><h3>2.It should go multiple user and related persons.</h3>');
      SmtpMail.AddAttachment(Filepath,FileName);
      SmtpMail.Send;
    END;

    BEGIN
    END.
  }
}

OBJECT Codeunit 70003 PurhOrderMail
{
  OBJECT-PROPERTIES
  {
    Date=08-11-18;
    Time=11:31:42;
    Modified=Yes;
    Version List=;
  }
  PROPERTIES
  {
    OnRun=BEGIN
          END;

  }
  CODE
  {
    VAR
      vendorRec@1000 : Record 23;
      EmailItemRec@1001 : Record 9500;
      PurchRec@1002 : Record 13;
      tex@1003 : Text;
      MYFile@1004 : File;
      ostream@1005 : OutStream;
      EmailConfirm@1006 : Page 9700;
      SmtpMail@1007 : Codeunit 400;
      Str1@1008 : Text[250];
      Filepath@1009 : Text;
      FileName@1010 : Text;
      CompRec@1015 : Record 79;
      CompanyLogo@1014 : Record 99008535;
      FileLogo@1013 : Text;
      FileManagement@1012 : Codeunit 419;
      FileName1@1011 : Text;

    [EventSubscriber(Page,50,OnAfterActionEvent,send)]
    PROCEDURE SendMail@1(VAR Rec@1000 : Record 38);
    BEGIN
      CompRec.GET;
      CompRec.CALCFIELDS(Picture);
      CLEAR(CompanyLogo);
      CompanyLogo.DELETEALL;
      IF CompRec.Picture.HASVALUE THEN BEGIN
       CompanyLogo.INIT;
       CompanyLogo.Blob := CompRec.Picture;
       CompanyLogo.INSERT;
       FileName1 := 'tmp*.tmp.jpg';
       FileLogo := FileManagement.BLOBExport(CompanyLogo,FileName1,FALSE);
      END;

      FileName := Rec."No." + '.pdf';
      Filepath := 'D:\share16\Renupriya\' + FileName;
      Rec.SETRANGE("No.",Rec."No.");
      REPORT.SAVEASPDF(50001,Filepath);
      tex := STRSUBSTNO('Po No %1 Date %2',Rec."No.",Rec."Order Date");
      CLEAR(SmtpMail);
      IF vendorRec.GET(Rec."Buy-from Vendor No.") THEN
      SmtpMail.CreateMessage('Renupriya','renupriya.k@cetastech.com',vendorRec."E-Mail",tex,'',TRUE);
      IF PurchRec.GET(Rec."Purchaser Code") THEN
      SmtpMail.AddCC(PurchRec."E-Mail" +';'+ PurchRec."E-Mail 2");
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<body><h2>Dear Sir/Maam,<h2><h3>Greetings from Durian Furniture!</h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 :=STRSUBSTNO('<h3>Please find attached the details of Purchase order information for your reference. Furthermore, We request you to kindly provide us with the following as it is required by us:-</h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>1.An acknowledgement of this Purchase order via email.</h3><h3>2.Delivery schedule of the material.</h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>3.Complete material details in the purchase invoice.</h3><h3>4.Purchase order number and GSTN number should be appeared in the supplied invoice.</h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>5.At the time of supplying the material, if you have any problems please inform us immediately.</h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>Purchase order Generated by %1</h3><h3>If you have any queries please feel free to contact us.</h3>',USERID);
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>Thanks and Regards.<h3><h3>Purchase Manager,</h3><h3>DURIAN INDUSTRIES LIMITED</h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3>401,THE SUMMIT,HANUMAN ROAD,WESTERN EXPRESS HIGHWAY,VILE PARLE-EAST,MUMBAI-400057,MAHARASHTRA-INDIA</h3><h4>PHONENO.-022-26269000<h4>PAN- AAACD1698N<h4>EMAIL-info@durian.in<h4>CIN-U51900MH1992PLC069235');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      Str1 := STRSUBSTNO('<h3><u>Note : </u></h3><h3>1.System should send email to customer whose email id is default.</h3><h3>2.It should go multiple user and related persons.</h3>');
      SmtpMail.AppendBody(Str1);
      SmtpMail.AddAttachment(Filepath,FileName);
      SmtpMail.Send;
    END;

    BEGIN
    END.
  }
}

OBJECT Codeunit 70004 SendMailSO
{
  OBJECT-PROPERTIES
  {
    Date=15-10-18;
    Time=16:06:26;
    Modified=Yes;
    Version List=;
  }
  PROPERTIES
  {
    OnRun=BEGIN
          END;

  }
  CODE
  {
    VAR
      SalesHdr@1000 : Record 36;
      FileName@1001 : Text[250];
      FilePath@1002 : Text[250];
      salesRep@1003 : Report 50001;
      SmtpMailSetup@1004 : Record 409;
      SmtpMail@1005 : Codeunit 400;
      "Sales/PurchRec"@1006 : Record 13;

    [EventSubscriber(Page,42,OnAfterActionEvent,SendMail)]
    PROCEDURE SalesOrderMail@1(VAR Rec@1000 : Record 36);
    BEGIN
      SalesHdr.RESET;
      IF SalesHdr.GET(Rec."No.") THEN BEGIN
        FileName := SalesHdr."Sell-to Customer No."+'.pdf';
        FilePath := 'D:\share16\Renupriya\'+FileName;
        CLEAR(salesRep);
        //salesRep.SetDocNo(Rec."No.");
        salesRep.SETTABLEVIEW(Rec);
        salesRep.SAVEASPDF(FileName);
        SmtpMailSetup.GET;
        SmtpMail.AddRecipients(Rec.Email);
        SalesHdr.RESET;
        SalesHdr.SETCURRENTKEY("Salesperson Code");
        //IF "Sales/PurchRec".FINDFIRST THEN
          //SalesHdr.cc := "Sales/PurchRec"."E-Mail";


        END;
    END;

    BEGIN
    END.
  }
}

      SmtpMail.CreateMessage('Renupriya','renupriya.k@cetastech.com',CustRec."E-Mail",Str2,'',TRUE);

OBJECT Page 20 General Ledger Entries
{
  OBJECT-PROPERTIES
  {
    Date=11-09-18;
    Time=11:32:30;
    Modified=Yes;
    Version List=NAVW19.00.00.48067,NAVIN9.00.00.48067;
  }
  PROPERTIES
  {
    Editable=No;
    CaptionML=[ENU=General Ledger Entries;
               ENN=General Ledger Entries];
    SourceTable=Table17;
    DataCaptionExpr=GetCaption;
    PageType=List;
    OnOpenPage=BEGIN
                 IF GETFILTERS <> '' THEN
                   IF FINDFIRST THEN;
                 GLRRec1.SETCURRENTKEY("Posting Date");
                 GLRRec1.FINDFIRST;
                 GLRRec2.SETCURRENTKEY("Posting Date");
                 GLRRec2.FINDFIRST;
                 FromDate := GLRRec2."Posting Date";
               END;

    OnAfterGetRecord=BEGIN
                       OpeningBalance := 0;
                       Credit := 0;
                       Debit := 0;
                       ClosingBalance := 0;
                       GLRRec.RESET;
                       GLRRec.COPYFILTERS(Rec);
                       IF GLRRec.FINDFIRST THEN
                       REPEAT
                         Debit += GLRRec."Debit Amount";
                         Credit += GLRRec."Credit Amount";
                       UNTIL GLRRec.NEXT = 0;
                       //----------------------------------------------
                       StrPD := Rec.GETFILTER("Posting Date");
                       Strcpy := COPYSTR(StrPD,1,12);
                       EVALUATE(ToDate,Strcpy);
                       GLRRec1.COPYFILTERS(Rec);
                       GLRRec1.FINDFIRST;
                       GLRRec2.RESET;
                       GLRRec2.SETRANGE("Posting Date",FromDate,ToDate);
                       IF GLRRec2.FINDFIRST THEN
                       REPEAT
                         IF GLRRec2."G/L Account No." = GLRRec1."G/L Account No." THEN
                           BEGIN
                            OpeningBalance += GLRRec2.Amount;
                           END
                       UNTIL GLRRec2.NEXT = 0;

                       ClosingBalance := OpeningBalance + Debit - Credit;
                       //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                     END;

    OnAfterGetCurrRecord=VAR
                           IncomingDocument@1000 : Record 130;
                         BEGIN
                           HasIncomingDocument := IncomingDocument.PostedDocExists("Document No.","Posting Date");
                           CurrPage.IncomingDocAttachFactBox.PAGE.LoadDataFromRecord(Rec);
                         END;

    ActionList=ACTIONS
    {
      { 1900000003;0 ;ActionContainer;
                      ActionContainerType=RelatedInformation }
      { 48      ;1   ;ActionGroup;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Ent&ry;
                                 ENN=Ent&ry];
                      Image=Entry }
      { 49      ;2   ;Action    ;
                      AccessByPermission=TableData 348=R;
                      ShortCutKey=Shift+Ctrl+D;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Dimensions;
                                 ENN=Dimensions];
                      Image=Dimensions;
                      Scope=Repeater;
                      OnAction=BEGIN
                                 ShowDimensions;
                                 CurrPage.SAVERECORD;
                               END;
                                }
      { 50      ;2   ;Action    ;
                      Name=GLDimensionOverview;
                      AccessByPermission=TableData 348=R;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=G/L Dimension Overview;
                                 ENN=G/L Dimension Overview];
                      Image=Dimensions;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 GLEntriesDimensionOverview@1000 : Page 563;
                               BEGIN
                                 IF ISTEMPORARY THEN BEGIN
                                   GLEntriesDimensionOverview.SetTempGLEntry(Rec);
                                   GLEntriesDimensionOverview.RUN;
                                 END ELSE
                                   PAGE.RUN(PAGE::"G/L Entries Dimension Overview",Rec);
                               END;
                                }
      { 65      ;2   ;Action    ;
                      AccessByPermission=TableData 27=R;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Value Entries;
                                 ENN=Value Entries];
                      Image=ValueLedger;
                      Scope=Repeater;
                      OnAction=BEGIN
                                 ShowValueEntries;
                               END;
                                }
      { 1500000 ;2   ;Action    ;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Narration;
                                 ENN=Narration];
                      RunObject=Page 16578;
                      RunPageLink=Entry No.=FILTER(0),
                                  Transaction No.=FIELD(Transaction No.);
                      Image=Description }
      { 1500001 ;2   ;Action    ;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Line Narration;
                                 ENN=Line Narration];
                      RunObject=Page 16578;
                      RunPageLink=Entry No.=FIELD(Entry No.),
                                  Transaction No.=FIELD(Transaction No.);
                      Image=LineDescription }
      { 1500002 ;2   ;Action    ;
                      Ellipsis=Yes;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Print Voucher;
                                 ENN=Print Voucher];
                      Image=PrintVoucher;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 GLEntry@1500000 : Record 17;
                               BEGIN
                                 GLEntry.SETCURRENTKEY("Document No.","Posting Date");
                                 GLEntry.SETRANGE("Document No.","Document No.");
                                 GLEntry.SETRANGE("Posting Date","Posting Date");
                                 IF GLEntry.FINDFIRST THEN
                                   REPORT.RUNMODAL(REPORT::"Posted Voucher",TRUE,TRUE,GLEntry);
                               END;
                                }
      { 1500003 ;2   ;Action    ;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Bank Charges;
                                 ENN=Bank Charges];
                      RunObject=Page 16521;
                      RunPageView=SORTING(GL Entry No.,Bank Charge);
                      RunPageLink=GL Entry No.=FIELD(Entry No.);
                      Image=Percentage }
      { 1900000004;0 ;ActionContainer;
                      ActionContainerType=ActionItems }
      { 57      ;1   ;ActionGroup;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=F&unctions;
                                 ENN=F&unctions];
                      Image=Action }
      { 63      ;2   ;Action    ;
                      Name=ReverseTransaction;
                      Ellipsis=Yes;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Reverse Transaction;
                                 ENN=Reverse Transaction];
                      Image=ReverseRegister;
                      Scope=Repeater;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 ReversalEntry@1000 : Record 179;
                               BEGIN
                                 CLEAR(ReversalEntry);
                                 IF Reversed THEN
                                   ReversalEntry.AlreadyReversedEntry(TABLECAPTION,"Entry No.");
                                 IF "Journal Batch Name" = '' THEN
                                   ReversalEntry.TestFieldError;
                                 TESTFIELD("Transaction No.");
                                 ReversalEntry.ReverseTransaction("Transaction No.")
                               END;
                                }
      { 15      ;2   ;ActionGroup;
                      Name=IncomingDocument;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Incoming Document;
                                 ENN=Incoming Document];
                      ActionContainerType=NewDocumentItems;
                      Image=Documents }
      { 13      ;3   ;Action    ;
                      Name=IncomingDocCard;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=View Incoming Document;
                                 ENN=View Incoming Document];
                      ToolTipML=;
                      Enabled=HasIncomingDocument;
                      Image=ViewOrder;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 IncomingDocument@1000 : Record 130;
                               BEGIN
                                 IncomingDocument.ShowCard("Document No.","Posting Date");
                               END;
                                }
      { 9       ;3   ;Action    ;
                      Name=SelectIncomingDoc;
                      AccessByPermission=TableData 130=R;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Select Incoming Document;
                                 ENN=Select Incoming Document];
                      ToolTipML=;
                      Enabled=NOT HasIncomingDocument;
                      Image=SelectLineToApply;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 IncomingDocument@1000 : Record 130;
                               BEGIN
                                 IncomingDocument.SelectIncomingDocumentForPostedDocument("Document No.","Posting Date");
                               END;
                                }
      { 3       ;3   ;Action    ;
                      Name=IncomingDocAttachFile;
                      Ellipsis=Yes;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Create Incoming Document from File;
                                 ENN=Create Incoming Document from File];
                      ToolTipML=;
                      Enabled=NOT HasIncomingDocument;
                      Image=Attach;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 IncomingDocumentAttachment@1000 : Record 133;
                               BEGIN
                                 IncomingDocumentAttachment.NewAttachmentFromPostedDocument("Document No.","Posting Date");
                               END;
                                }
      { 24      ;1   ;Action    ;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=&Navigate;
                                 ENN=&Navigate];
                      Promoted=Yes;
                      Image=Navigate;
                      PromotedCategory=Process;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 Navigate@1000 : Page 344;
                               BEGIN
                                 Navigate.SetDoc("Posting Date","Document No.");
                                 Navigate.RUN;
                               END;
                                }
      { 11      ;1   ;Action    ;
                      Name=DocsWithoutIC;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Posted Documents without Incoming Document;
                                 ENN=Posted Documents without Incoming Document];
                      Image=Documents;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 PostedDocsWithNoIncBuf@1001 : Record 134;
                               BEGIN
                                 COPYFILTER("G/L Account No.",PostedDocsWithNoIncBuf."G/L Account No. Filter");
                                 PAGE.RUN(PAGE::"Posted Docs. With No Inc. Doc.",PostedDocsWithNoIncBuf);
                               END;
                                }
    }
  }
  CONTROLS

                ContainerType=ContentArea }

  CODE
  {
    VAR
      GLAcc@1000 : Record 15;
      HasIncomingDocument@1001 : Boolean;
      OpeningBalance@1002 : Decimal;
      Debit@1003 : Decimal;
      Credit@1004 : Decimal;
      ClosingBalance@1005 : Decimal;
      GLRRec@1006 : Record 17;
      GLRRec1@1007 : Record 17;
      GLRRec2@1008 : Record 17;
      StrPD@1009 : Text;
      Strcpy@1010 : Text;
      ToDate@1011 : Date;
      FromDate@1012 : Date;

    LOCAL PROCEDURE GetCaption@2() : Text[250];
    BEGIN
      IF GLAcc."No." <> "G/L Account No." THEN
        IF NOT GLAcc.GET("G/L Account No.") THEN
          IF GETFILTER("G/L Account No.") <> '' THEN
            IF GLAcc.GET(GETRANGEMIN("G/L Account No.")) THEN;
      EXIT(STRSUBSTNO('%1 %2',GLAcc."No.",GLAcc.Name))
    END;

    BEGIN
    END.
  }
}

OBJECT Page 25 Customer Ledger Entries
{
  OBJECT-PROPERTIES
  {
    Date=11-09-18;
    Time=11:22:16;
    Modified=Yes;
    Version List=NAVW19.00.00.49326,NAVIN9.00.00.49326;
  }
  PROPERTIES
  {
    CaptionML=[ENU=Customer Ledger Entries;
               ENN=Customer Ledger Entries];
    InsertAllowed=No;
    DeleteAllowed=No;
    SourceTable=Table21;
    DataCaptionFields=Customer No.;
    PageType=List;
    OnOpenPage=BEGIN
                 IF GETFILTERS <> '' THEN
                   IF FINDFIRST THEN;

                 CLERec1.SETCURRENTKEY("Posting Date");
                 CLERec1.FINDFIRST;
                 CLERec2.SETCURRENTKEY("Posting Date");
                 CLERec2.FINDFIRST;
                 FromDate := CLERec2."Posting Date";
               END;

    OnAfterGetRecord=BEGIN
                       StyleTxt := SetStyle;
                       //---------------------------
                       OpeningBalance := 0;
                       Credit := 0;
                       Debit := 0;
                       ClosingBalance := 0;
                       CLERec.RESET;
                       CLERec.COPYFILTERS(Rec);
                       IF CLERec.FINDFIRST THEN
                       REPEAT
                         CLERec.CALCFIELDS(Amount,"Debit Amount","Credit Amount");
                         Debit += CLERec."Debit Amount";
                         Credit += CLERec."Credit Amount";
                       UNTIL CLERec.NEXT = 0;
                       //----------------------------------------------
                       StrPD := Rec.GETFILTER("Posting Date");
                       Strcpy := COPYSTR(StrPD,1,10);
                       EVALUATE(ToDate,Strcpy);
                       //ToDate := CALCDATE('-1D',ToDate);
                       //VLERec1.RESET;
                       CLERec1.COPYFILTERS(Rec);
                       CLERec1.FINDFIRST;
                       CLERec2.RESET;
                       CLERec2.SETRANGE("Posting Date",FromDate,ToDate);
                       IF CLERec2.FINDFIRST THEN
                       REPEAT
                         IF CLERec2."Customer No." = CLERec1."Customer No." THEN
                           BEGIN
                            CLERec2.CALCFIELDS(Amount);
                            OpeningBalance += CLERec2.Amount;
                           END
                       UNTIL CLERec2.NEXT = 0;

                       ClosingBalance := OpeningBalance + Debit - Credit;
                       //-------------------------------------------
                     END;

    OnModifyRecord=BEGIN
                     CODEUNIT.RUN(CODEUNIT::"Cust. Entry-Edit",Rec);
                     EXIT(FALSE);
                   END;

    OnAfterGetCurrRecord=VAR
                           IncomingDocument@1000 : Record 130;
                         BEGIN
                           HasIncomingDocument := IncomingDocument.PostedDocExists("Document No.","Posting Date");
                           CurrPage.IncomingDocAttachFactBox.PAGE.LoadDataFromRecord(Rec);
                         END;

    ActionList=ACTIONS
    {
      { 1900000003;0 ;ActionContainer;
                      ActionContainerType=RelatedInformation }
      { 24      ;1   ;ActionGroup;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Ent&ry;
                                 ENN=Ent&ry];
                      Image=Entry }
      { 25      ;2   ;Action    ;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Reminder/Fin. Charge Entries;
                                 ENN=Reminder/Fin. Charge Entries];
                      RunObject=Page 444;
                      RunPageView=SORTING(Customer Entry No.);
                      RunPageLink=Customer Entry No.=FIELD(Entry No.);
                      Image=Reminder;
                      Scope=Repeater }
      { 69      ;2   ;Action    ;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Applied E&ntries;
                                 ENN=Applied E&ntries];
                      RunObject=Page 61;
                      RunPageOnRec=Yes;
                      Image=Approve;
                      Scope=Repeater }
      { 51      ;2   ;Action    ;
                      AccessByPermission=TableData 348=R;
                      ShortCutKey=Shift+Ctrl+D;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Dimensions;
                                 ENN=Dimensions];
                      Image=Dimensions;
                      Scope=Repeater;
                      OnAction=BEGIN
                                 ShowDimensions;
                               END;
                                }
      { 52      ;2   ;Action    ;
                      ShortCutKey=Ctrl+F7;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Detailed &Ledger Entries;
                                 ENN=Detailed &Ledger Entries];
                      RunObject=Page 573;
                      RunPageView=SORTING(Cust. Ledger Entry No.,Posting Date);
                      RunPageLink=Cust. Ledger Entry No.=FIELD(Entry No.),
                                  Customer No.=FIELD(Customer No.);
                      Image=View;
                      Scope=Repeater }
      { 1500000 ;2   ;Action    ;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Narration;
                                 ENN=Narration];
                      RunObject=Page 16578;
                      RunPageLink=Entry No.=FILTER(0),
                                  Transaction No.=FIELD(Transaction No.);
                      Image=Description }
      { 1500001 ;2   ;Action    ;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Line Narration;
                                 ENN=Line Narration];
                      RunObject=Page 16578;
                      RunPageLink=Entry No.=FIELD(Entry No.),
                                  Transaction No.=FIELD(Transaction No.);
                      Image=LineDescription }
      { 1500002 ;2   ;Action    ;
                      Ellipsis=Yes;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Print Voucher;
                                 ENN=Print Voucher];
                      Image=PrintVoucher;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 GLentry@1500000 : Record 17;
                               BEGIN
                                 GLentry.SETCURRENTKEY("Document No.","Posting Date");
                                 GLentry.SETRANGE("Document No.","Document No.");
                                 GLentry.SETRANGE("Posting Date","Posting Date");
                                 IF GLentry.FIND('-') THEN
                                   REPORT.RUNMODAL(REPORT::"Posted Voucher",TRUE,TRUE,GLentry);
                               END;
                                }
      { 1500005 ;2   ;Action    ;
                      Ellipsis=Yes;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Print GST Voucher;
                                 ENN=Print GST Voucher];
                      Image=PrintVoucher;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 CustLedgerEntry@1500000 : Record 21;
                               BEGIN
                                 CustLedgerEntry.RESET;
                                 CustLedgerEntry.SETRANGE("Document No.","Document No.");
                                 REPORT.RUNMODAL(16411,TRUE,TRUE,CustLedgerEntry);
                               END;
                                }
      { 1900000004;0 ;ActionContainer;
                      ActionContainerType=ActionItems }
      { 34      ;1   ;ActionGroup;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=F&unctions;
                                 ENN=F&unctions];
                      Image=Action }
      { 36      ;2   ;Action    ;
                      Name=Apply Entries;
                      ShortCutKey=Shift+F11;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Apply Entries;
                                 ENN=Apply Entries];
                      Image=ApplyEntries;
                      Scope=Repeater;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 CustLedgEntry@1000 : Record 21;
                                 CustEntryApplyPostEntries@1001 : Codeunit 226;
                               BEGIN
                                 CustLedgEntry.COPY(Rec);
                                 CustEntryApplyPostEntries.ApplyCustEntryFormEntry(CustLedgEntry);
                                 Rec := CustLedgEntry;
                                 CurrPage.UPDATE;
                               END;
                                }
      { 63      ;2   ;Separator  }
      { 64      ;2   ;Action    ;
                      Name=UnapplyEntries;
                      Ellipsis=Yes;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Unapply Entries;
                                 ENN=Unapply Entries];
                      Image=UnApply;
                      Scope=Repeater;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 CustEntryApplyPostedEntries@1000 : Codeunit 226;
                               BEGIN
                                 CustEntryApplyPostedEntries.UnApplyCustLedgEntry("Entry No.");
                               END;
                                }
      { 65      ;2   ;Separator  }
      { 66      ;2   ;Action    ;
                      Name=ReverseTransaction;
                      Ellipsis=Yes;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Reverse Transaction;
                                 ENN=Reverse Transaction];
                      Image=ReverseRegister;
                      Scope=Repeater;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 ReversalEntry@1000 : Record 179;
                               BEGIN
                                 CLEAR(ReversalEntry);
                                 IF Reversed THEN
                                   ReversalEntry.AlreadyReversedEntry(TABLECAPTION,"Entry No.");
                                 IF "Journal Batch Name" = '' THEN
                                   ReversalEntry.TestFieldError;
                                 TESTFIELD("Transaction No.");
                                 ReversalEntry.ReverseTransaction("Transaction No.");
                               END;
                                }
      { 19      ;2   ;ActionGroup;
                      Name=IncomingDocument;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Incoming Document;
                                 ENN=Incoming Document];
                      ActionContainerType=NewDocumentItems;
                      Image=Documents }
      { 17      ;3   ;Action    ;
                      Name=IncomingDocCard;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=View Incoming Document;
                                 ENN=View Incoming Document];
                      ToolTipML=;
                      Enabled=HasIncomingDocument;
                      Image=ViewOrder;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 IncomingDocument@1000 : Record 130;
                               BEGIN
                                 IncomingDocument.ShowCard("Document No.","Posting Date");
                               END;
                                }
      { 15      ;3   ;Action    ;
                      Name=SelectIncomingDoc;
                      AccessByPermission=TableData 130=R;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Select Incoming Document;
                                 ENN=Select Incoming Document];
                      ToolTipML=;
                      Enabled=NOT HasIncomingDocument;
                      Image=SelectLineToApply;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 IncomingDocument@1000 : Record 130;
                               BEGIN
                                 IncomingDocument.SelectIncomingDocumentForPostedDocument("Document No.","Posting Date");
                               END;
                                }
      { 11      ;3   ;Action    ;
                      Name=IncomingDocAttachFile;
                      Ellipsis=Yes;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Create Incoming Document from File;
                                 ENN=Create Incoming Document from File];
                      ToolTipML=;
                      Enabled=NOT HasIncomingDocument;
                      Image=Attach;
                      OnAction=VAR
                                 IncomingDocumentAttachment@1000 : Record 133;
                               BEGIN
                                 IncomingDocumentAttachment.NewAttachmentFromPostedDocument("Document No.","Posting Date");
                               END;
                                }
      { 37      ;1   ;Action    ;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=&Navigate;
                                 ENN=&Navigate];
                      Promoted=Yes;
                      Image=Navigate;
                      PromotedCategory=Process;
                      Scope=Repeater;
                      OnAction=BEGIN
                                 Navigate.SetDoc("Posting Date","Document No.");
                                 Navigate.RUN;
                               END;
                                }
      { 13      ;1   ;Action    ;
                      ShortCutKey=Return;
                      CaptionML=[ENU=Show Posted Document;
                                 ENN=Show Posted Document];
                      Promoted=Yes;
                      PromotedIsBig=Yes;
                      Image=Document;
                      PromotedCategory=Process;
                      OnAction=BEGIN
                                 ShowDoc
                               END;
                                }
    }
  }
  CONTROLS
